Skill's display order is managed in the skills table found on the `Project -> Subject` page. In order to enable sorting controls you must first sort the table by the `Display Order` column in the ascending order:
![image.png](data:image/png;base64,)
Once sorted then it's just the matter of clicking up/down controls in order to affect the skill's display order.

The new order will also be reflected for your users' Skills Display.
